features.text: Added "does not equal" operator to single-select fields when defining a view's filter.

tweaks.text: Created documentation pages covering the recently-added Filter and Kanban views.
Updated view configuration to better reflect the board's available classifications and fields.
tweaks.reasoning: When the board didn't have classifications or fields that could be used by a filter, the options were still showing as available. Invalid options are now disabled with a message explaining the reason.

tweaks.text: Added separate "control" panes for each view type.
tweaks.reasoning: While we try to stay consistent with our controls, they can differ slightly between the views. The controls pane now updates to reflect your current view.

tweaks.text: Improved style consistency throughout the app.
